ComicInfo.Summary: “THE FAR REACHING TENTACLES OF N’RYGOTH,” Part One A brand new booze-soaked arc of Rat Queens reveals a growing menace within the very walls of Palisade. And while Dee may have run from her past, the bloated, blood-feasting sky god N’rygoth never really lets his children stray too far. FIRST ISSUE OF A NEW STORY ARC! PERFECT JUMP-ON POINT!

ComicInfo.Title: The Far Reaching Tentacles of N'Rygoth, Part One
ComicInfo.StoryArc: The Far Reaching Tentacles of N'Rygoth
